00043 template <class STATE>
00044 struct ConnectionToStateMapping {
00045     Connection connection;
00046     Time       timeout;
00047     STATE      state;
00048     bool       bTmrActive;
00049     
00050     ConnectionToStateMapping(const ConnectionToStateMapping<STATE> &rhs) :
00051         connection(rhs.connection), timeout(rhs.timeout), state(rhs.state), bTmrActive(rhs.bTmrActive) 
00052     {
00053     }
00054     
00055     ConnectionToStateMapping(const Connection &c, const Time &t, const STATE &s, const bool &b) :
00056         connection(c), timeout(t), state(s), bTmrActive(b) 
00057     {
00058     }
00059     
00060     ConnectionToStateMapping() : connection(), timeout(), state(), bTmrActive() {
00061     }
00062     
00063     ConnectionToStateMapping<STATE> & operator=(const ConnectionToStateMapping<STATE> &rhs)  {
00064         connection = rhs.connection; 
00065         timeout    = rhs.timeout; 
00066         state      = rhs.state;
00067         bTmrActive = rhs.bTmrActive; 
00068 
00069         return *this;
00070     }
00071     
00072     bool MatchesSource(const Connection &rhs) const {
00073         return connection.MatchesSource(rhs);
00074     }
00075     
00076     bool MatchesDest(const Connection &rhs) const {
00077         return connection.MatchesDest(rhs);
00078     }
00079     
00080     bool MatchesProtocol(const Connection &rhs) const {
00081         return connection.MatchesProtocol(rhs);
00082     }
00083     
00084     bool Matches(const Connection &rhs) const {
00085         return connection.Matches(rhs);
00086     }
00087     
00088     std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &os) const {
00089         os << "ConnectionToStateMapping"
00090            << "( connection="  << connection
00091            << ", timeout="     << timeout
00092            << ", state="       << state
00093            << ", bTmrActive="  << bTmrActive
00094            << ")";
00095         return os;
00096     }
00097     
00098     friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const ConnectionToStateMapping<STATE> &L) {
00099         return L.Print(os);
00100     }
00101 };

00105 template <class STATE>
00106 class ConnectionList : public std::deque<ConnectionToStateMapping<STATE> > {
00107  public:
00108     ConnectionList(const ConnectionList &rhs) : std::deque<ConnectionToStateMapping<STATE> >(rhs) {}
00109     ConnectionList() {}
00110         
00111     typedef typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator iterator;
00112     typedef typename ConnectionList<STATE>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00113     
00114     typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator FindEarliest() {
00115         typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator ptr = this->end();
00116         typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator i = this->begin();
00117         
00118         // No connections in list
00119         if(this->empty())
00120             return this->end();
00121         
00122         // 1 connection in list
00123         if(this->size() == 1) {
00124             if((*i).bTmrActive == true)
00125                 return this->begin();
00126             else {
00127                 return this->end();
00128             }
00129         }
00130         
00131         // More than one connection in list
00132         Time min=(*i).timeout;
00133         for (; i != this->end(); ++i) {
00134             if ((*i).bTmrActive == true && (*i).timeout <= min) {
00135                 min=(*i).timeout;
00136                 ptr=i;
00137             }
00138         }
00139         return ptr;
00140     }
00141     
00142     typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator FindMatching(const Connection &rhs) {
00143         for (typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator i = this->begin(); i != this->end(); ++i) {
00144             if ((*i).Matches(rhs)) {
00145                 return i;
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         return this->end();
00149     }
00150     typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator FindMatchingSource(const Connection &rhs) {
00151         for (typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator i = this->begin(); i != this->end(); ++i) {
00152             if ((*i).MatchesSource(rhs)) {
00153                 return i;
00154             }
00155         }
00156         return this->end();
00157     }
00158     typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator FindMatchingDest(const Connection &rhs) {
00159         for (typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator i = this->begin(); i != this->end(); ++i) {
00160             if ((*i).MatchesDest(rhs)) {
00161                 return i;
00162             }
00163         }
00164         return this->end();
00165     }
00166     typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator FindMatchingProtocol(const Connection &rhs) {
00167         for (typename ConnectionList<STATE>::iterator i = this->begin(); i != this->end(); ++i) {
00168             if ((*i).MatchesProtocol(rhs)) {
00169                 return i;
00170             }
00171         }
00172         return this->end();
00173     }
00174     
00175     std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &os) const {
00176         os << "ConnectionList(";
00177         for (const_iterator i = this->begin(); i != this->end(); ++i) {
00178             os << (*i);
00179         }
00180         os << ")";
00181         return os;
00182     }
00183     
00184     friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const ConnectionList& L) {
00185         return L.Print(os);
00186     }
00187 };
